text: Jang Sung-taek (alternatively Jang Song Thaek or Chang Sung-taek; 2 February 1946 - 13 December 2013 North Korea Says Kimâ€™s Uncle Executed The New York Times 12 December 2013) was a leading figure in the government of North Korea. He was married to Kim Kyong-hui, aunt of Kim Jong-un, the supreme leader of North Korea. On 13 December, North Korean state media announced he had been executed. ==References== ==Other websites== *North Korean Leadership Watch Category:1946 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Executed people Category:North Korean politicians Category:Business people Category:Criminals
title: Jang Sung-taek
